ISIS has claimed responsibility for the three explosions...
...two at the airport and one at a metro station in the heart of the capital.
At least 34 people have been killed while 130 have been injured.
In response to the bombing, Belgium has raised its terror alert to its maximum level.
A photograph taken from closed-circuit television...
...shows a man wearing a black hat, a light-colored jacket, and sunglasses...
...pushing an airport luggage cart alongside two other men...
...who are believed to have been the suicide bombers.
